entry.title: Nocterna - The Darkened Realm
entry.summary: A farmer awakes in the small village of Dawnmill, due east of the capital. He opens his windows and is greeted by a soft, orange glow, not that of the sun, but of the Light: a massive web of dancing lights that cover all the night skies. The orange aurora indicates the warm season continues. Amidst the orange are streaks of verdant green, which is a promise of a bountiful harvest. The farmer ...
